element.name: audiomixmatrix
element.description: Mixes a number of input channels into a number of output channels according to a transformation matrix
element.author: Vivia Nikolaidou <vivia@toolsonair.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw, channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], layout=(string)interleaved, format=(string){ F32LE, F64LE, S16LE, S32LE }

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw, channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], layout=(string)interleaved, format=(string){ F32LE, F64LE, S16LE, S32LE }
